external_references.source_name: O365 Blog Azure AD Device IDs

objects.description: Monitor for attempts to access information stored in the Registry about certificates and their associated private keys. For example, user certificates are commonly stored under `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\SystemCertificates`.(Citation: SpecterOps Certified Pre Owned)(Citation: O365 Blog Azure AD Device IDs)
